citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 07-JAN-
21. The registrant was reached by phone and stated no one was available that day.
End Section
